meta.description: Maximize profit from producing chairs and dressers given resource constraints.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced by Elm Furniture

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of each product

params.name: stain_requirement
params.description: Gallons of stain required per unit of each product

params.name: wood_requirement
params.description: Lengths of oak wood required per unit of each product

params.name: stain_available
params.description: Total gallons of stain available per week

params.name: wood_available
params.description: Total lengths of oak wood available per week

vars.name: production
vars.description: Number of units produced for each product

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from producing chairs and dressers

constraints.name: stain_constraint
constraints.description: Total stain used cannot exceed available stain

constraints.name: wood_constraint
constraints.description: Total wood used cannot exceed available wood
